attributes.action: Teach about Racial, Gender, Sexual Equality, and Diversity in Education
attributes.additional_details: People need to become better educated regarding these topics and how in past and present time people face prejudice. Why not educate people to be understanding and open? Surely, this will create a better society for all. People need to be educated.
attributes.background: Throughout my time in education these topics were not discussed often and in depth, which in hindsight is not acceptable. I suggest that the government acts and implements these teachings to all individuals in education from a young age and throughout.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/323808

Amend the Equality Act 2010: National curriculum and protected characteristics: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/327300

We have also published several petitions about race and equality more widely, which you can view here: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions?state=open&topic=race-and-equality
